Package auctionClasses

Class Auction

java.lang.Object
auctionClasses.Auction
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuctionFollower, Serializable
public class Auction extends Object implements AuctionFollower, Serializable
Class which manages the backend of the application Implements serializable, so we can store all the information about the current auction and send it to others via internet
See Also:
